thread.title: Facebook Says It Fixed A Bug That Caused Silent Audio To Vampire Your iPhone Battery
thread.title_full: Facebook Says It Fixed A Bug That Caused Silent Audio To Vampire Your iPhone Battery

title: Facebook Says It Fixed A Bug That Caused Silent Audio To Vampire Your iPhone Battery
text:
Facebook Says It Fixed A Bug That Caused Silent Audio To Vampire Your iPhone Battery 
Tech Crunch Friday 23rd October, 2015 
posted an explanation for the recent issues with the app gorging itself on power. Grant says that the battery issues were caused by a series of bugs including one that ate up extra CPU cycles, causing Facebook to use up more of your iPhone battery than it should. 
After a...
